data.description: Send HTML and Text Embedded Newsletters
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Gives the user an object oriented interface for sending html and
    text multipart/alternative emails using either an smtp server, or
    mail processor - ie: sendmail, qmail.

    Generates the boundary for the multipart/alternative email, and
    then sends it.
